recipesJson.name: Lab Works Tea
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
In collaboration with Labworks. This is a beautiful full bodied green tea with hints of peach and apple. Enjoy. 


Visit DIY MIXERS CREW on Discord https://discord.gg/h5UGxYr

Watch DIY MIXERS CREW LIVE on YouTube every Sunday at 4:30 pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/DIYMIXERSCREW
Please comment, mix, and or rate,....it makes us all better mixers. Enjoy :)
